title: 1.12mod服务器不时闪退（用bc连接主世界和地皮世界）
author: 荣曜1
txt_content:
本帖最后由 荣曜1 于 2020-8-2 00:50 编辑 

[00:44:00 INFO]: UUID of player longhun is 8dc4710d-e8c3-3ccf-80b3-5fdd3f779567
[00:44:00 INFO]: 客户端尝试加载以下模组加入服务器: 87
[00:44:00 INFO]: Forge Mod Loader 已成功加载 [mohist, aroma1997core, aromabackup, aromabackuprecovery] ModCLIENT
[00:44:00 INFO]: Skipping config sync, No mods have registered a syncable config.
[00:44:01 INFO]: [Server thread] Server side modded connection established
[00:44:01 INFO]: Sending custom spell data to longhun
[00:44:01 INFO]: Sent config to 'longhun.'
[00:44:01 INFO]: [Astral Sorcery] Waiting for server synchronization on login for longhun...
[00:44:01 INFO]: longhun[/192.168.1.3:58703] logged in with entity id 17871 at ([world]5201.494728559159, 99.4209208129729, 11006.5698129615)
[00:44:01 INFO]: [Astral Sorcery] Synchronizing baseline information to longhun
[00:44:03 INFO]: longhun lost connection: Disconnected
[00:44:03 INFO]: longhun left the game
这个是在直接登录主世界的时候主世界客户端的信息

这是闪退后的客户端
求解谢谢

replies.author: Kuro_neko
replies.txt_content:
看报告应该是星辉魔法MOD的问题
- Sponge or other server software is NOT supported. Any issues that arise when using Sponge (or other third-party server software other than Forge) that can't be reproduced in a Forge environment will not be fixed. Use other server software at your own risk!
该文转自模组原帖，意思是说不支持官方Forge服务端以外的服务端，我看到你用的好像是Mohist。解决方法：删除该Mod或更换官方的Forge服务端

replies.author: 荣曜1
replies.txt_content:
Kuro_neko 发表于 2020-8-2 02:29
